    • Method Detail

      • setCpuCount

        public VirtualMachineClassesTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setCpuCount(java.lang.Long cpuCount)
        The number of CPUs configured for virtual machine of this class. This property was added in vSphere API 7.0.2.00100. If null the current value the will not be modified.
        Parameters:
        cpuCount - New value for the property.

      • setCpuReservation

        public VirtualMachineClassesTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setCpuReservation(java.lang.Long cpuReservation)
        The percentage of total available CPUs reserved for a virtual machine. We multiply this percentage by the minimum frequency amongst all the cluster nodes to get the CPU reservation that is specified to vSphere in MHz. This property was added in vSphere API 7.0.2.00100. If null, no CPU reservation is requested for the virtual machine.
        Parameters:
        cpuReservation - New value for the property.

      • setMemoryMB

        public VirtualMachineClassesTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setMemoryMB(java.lang.Long memoryMB)
        The amount of memory in MB configured for virtual machine of this class. This property was added in vSphere API 7.0.2.00100. If null the current value the will not be modified.
        Parameters:
        memoryMB - New value for the property.

      • setMemoryReservation

        public VirtualMachineClassesTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setMemoryReservation(java.lang.Long memoryReservation)
        The percentage of available memory reserved for a virtual machine of this class. Memory reservation must be set to 100% for VM class with vGPU or Dynamic DirectPath I/O devices. This property was added in vSphere API 7.0.2.00100. If null, no memory reservation is requested for virtual machine.
        Parameters:
        memoryReservation - New value for the property.

      • setDescription

        public VirtualMachineClassesTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setDescription(java.lang.String description)
        Description for the VM class. This property was added in vSphere API 7.0.2.00100. If null, description is not updated.
        Parameters:
        description - New value for the property.

      • setDevices

        public VirtualMachineClassesTypes.UpdateSpec.Builder setDevices(VirtualMachineClassesTypes.VirtualDevices devices)
        Virtual devices corresponding to the VM class. This property was added in vSphere API 7.0.3.0. If null, virtual devices will not be updated.
        Parameters:
        devices - New value for the property.
